tool_description: API calculates BMR (Basal Metabolic Rate) and TMR (Total Metabolic Rate)
name: BMR and TMR
title: BMR and TMR

api_list.name: BMR index
api_list.description: Endpoint allows you to calculate the Basal Metabolic Rate

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: Enter the gender of the person you are calculating the index for. The currently supported genders are female and male.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: Enter the age of the person you are calculating the indicator for.

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: Enter the weight of the person you are calculating the index for. The weight should be expressed in kilograms.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: Enter the height of the person you are calculating the index for. Height should be expressed in centimeters.

api_list.name: TMR index
api_list.description: Endpoint allows you to calculate the Total Metabolic Rate

required_parameters.name: weight
required_parameters.description: Enter the weight of the person you are calculating the index for. The weight should be expressed in kilograms.

required_parameters.name: height
required_parameters.description: Enter the height of the person you are calculating the index for. The weight should be expressed in kilograms.

required_parameters.name: sex
required_parameters.description: Enter the gender of the person you are calculating the index for. The currently supported genders are female and male.

required_parameters.name: age
required_parameters.description: Enter the age of the person you are calculating the index for.

required_parameters.name: activity
required_parameters.description: Enter the physical activity of the person for whom you are calculating the index.

api_list.name: Activity Values
api_list.description: Returns a list of possible activity values that are needed to compute TMR
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bmr-and-tmr.p.rapidapi.com/activity-values"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bmr-and-tmr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sexes Values
api_list.description: Returns a list of possible sexes values that are needed to compute BMR and TMR
